vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰούλιος, -ου, ὁ
Julius: Act.27:1, 3.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Julius, "of Julian [the family of Julius Caesar]"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.27.1
§ Julius, "of Julian [the family of Julius Caesar]"
Julius, (Proper name), Acts 27:1, 3*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
猶流 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "髮毛柔軟的"
皇軍的千夫長, 受命將保羅下囚從該撒利亞 押送至羅馬 (徒 27:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
犹流 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "发毛柔软的"
皇军的千夫长, 受命将保罗下囚从该撒利亚 押送至罗马 (徒 27:1)
